lines: I went to Ul'dah hoping to find honest work, but there wasn't a single job to be had. At least nothing that didn't require me to give up my dignity.
No one's done us any favors. But it's just as well─I'm tired of asking. I may not be good with words, but I'm good enough with a knife. Good enough to fight for what's mine.

I've been helping guide the Immortal Flames reinforcements to Gyr Abania of late. I must say, considering I failed to find any work In Ul'dah, it is rather nice to have folks from there coming and asking me for help.
We have suffered much during the past twenty years. However, I now finally feel that there was meaning to our pain. I'm glad we were able to hold strong and live to see this day.
